column4: Hi people i'm trying a couple of days make work  my microphone, but don't make any sound. Anyone can help me ?
You don't have any sound as in you can't play anything either?
What is the output of "asoundconf list" ?
Names of available sound cards: Intel
try running "alsamixer" and make sure that the channel is not muted
I tried compiling alsa and my mic don't work
In what way is it "detected as wireless" ?
when i turn on my pc, ubuntu detected my ethernet card like a wlan0
where i can check aliases for ethernet cards ? In /etc/network/ i don't have that ethernet configured like wlan0 ?
